cyclone.name: TAMMY
cyclone.current_location: about 625 mi east of the Windward Islands
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west at first, then turning WNW and NW toward the Leeward Islands late Friday into Saturday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Barbados, Dominica, Martinique and Guadeloupe under Tropical Storm Watch
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Windward Islands and Leeward Islands, with possible effects extending to the U.S. and British Virgin Islands and eastern Puerto Rico
weather_observation.rain_fall_above_4_inch: Possibly up to 4 inches (upper-end of forecast range)
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds possible (25% chance of sustained ≥34 kt; 7% chance of ≥50 kt) mainly late Saturday through Sunday
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches likely with isolated totals to 4 inches; localized flash flooding or mud-slides in higher terrain possible
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents beginning late this week
